name: Fonta: Sweet Sakura
description:
"Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!"
Specially flavored Fonta, said to use Inazuman Sakura Blooms as an ingredient. When used as the theme for a Card Back, it seems to evoke the scenery of the land of thunder and lightning...
descriptionraw: "Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!"\nSpecially flavored Fonta, said to use Inazuman Sakura Blooms as an ingredient. When used as the theme for a Card Back, it seems to evoke the scenery of the land of thunder and lightning...
